General.Name: MK Electron Co. Ltd
General.Description: MK Electron Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and markets semiconductor packaging materials in Korea, Taiwan, China, and Southeast Asia. The company offers bonding wires and solders balls, including gold bonding wires, copper bonding wires, AG based wires, and advanced Au-Ag-alloy bonding wires, as well as sputtering target products made of gold based alloy, and evaporation materials. The company caters to the integrated device manufacturers and the semiconductor companies. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Yongin, South Korea.
